scripts.comment: Read an attribute from a tweet

custom-block.comment: Enter an attribute name (e.g. text, id or user.name) into the first field and again drag a tweet onto the cloud

scripts.comment: Show the text of all tweets on the stage

custom-block.comment: Here again, the cloud needs to be replaced by the tweet. As the "for each" block continuosly reads the tweets, we do not need to use "get one tweet" again. Instead, just drag the orange "tweet" from the outer block to the cloud

scripts.comment: Show all tweets on the map

custom-block.s: marker at position %s size %n color %txt popup text %s
custom-block.comment: This block shows a marker on the map. It needs a position, which can be read from a tweet using "get geo from tweet" block. You can customize the marker for example by using other colors. But you can also show a text when you click the marker on the stage. At the moment it just says "hello" - change it to the tweets text!

scripts.comment: For visualizing things we can use charts

custom-block.comment: This C-shaped block is used for defining the chart. On its inside, we can define different chart elements:

custom-block.s: bar chart: values: %l labels: %l name: %txt colors (hex): %l

custom-block.comment: for example a bar chart width a line at y=5

custom-block.s: bar chart: values: %l labels: %l name: %txt colors (hex): %l
chart line y values: %l name: %txt color: %txt

custom-block.comment: or a combined line- and bar chart

scripts.comment: And of course, the charts can visualize data gathered from Twitter

custom-block.comment: Drag the "get one tweet" block onto the cloud and then click the outer block
Click to get one tweet as text

custom-block.s: marker at position %s size %n color %txt popup text %s

block.l: var response, i, header; if (!proc.httpRequest) { proc.httpRequest = new XMLHttpRequest(); proc.httpRequest.open(method, url, true); proc.assertType(headers, 'list'); if(user != "" && password != "") proc.httpRequest.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Basic ' + window.btoa(user+":"+password)); for (i = 1; i <= headers.length(); i += 1) { header = headers.at(i); proc.assertType(header, 'list'); proc.httpRequest.setRequestHeader( header.at(1), header.at(2) ); } proc.httpRequest.send(data || null); } else if (proc.httpRequest.readyState === 4) { response = proc.httpRequest.responseText; proc.httpRequest = null; return response; } proc.pushContext('doYield'); proc.pushContext();

block-definition.comment: Reports a three-item list containing the latitude and longitude of the user, and the precision of the measurements. Works only if the user allows snap.berkeley.edu access to location data. Some browsers also require an HTTPS connection to Snap!.

block.l: if (!proc.geostarted) { var geo = navigator.geolocation; var cords = []; var options = { enableHighAccuracy: false, }; function success(pos) { console.log(pos); proc.geocords = [pos.coords.latitude, pos.coords.longitude, pos.coords.accuracy]; } function error(err) { alert("ERROR " + err.code + ": " + err.message); } proc.geostarted = true; proc.geocords = null; console.log("starting geolocation") geo.getCurrentPosition(success, error, options); } else if (proc.geocords) { var cords = proc.geocords; proc.geostarted = null; proc.geocords = null; console.log("returning"); return new List(cords); } else { console.log("yielding"); proc.pushContext('doYield'); proc.pushContext(); }

if(document.getElementById("leaflet_div") === null) { var css = document.createElement('link'); css.setAttribute("rel","stylesheet"); css.setAttribute("href", "/libraries/leaflet/leaflet.css"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css); var sc = document.createElement('script'); sc.setAttribute("type","text/javascript"); sc.setAttribute("src", "/libraries/leaflet/leaflet.js"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(sc); setTimeout(function() { var css = document.createElement('link'); css.setAttribute("rel","stylesheet"); css.setAttribute("href", "/libraries/leaflet/leaflet.fullscreen.css"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css); var sc = document.createElement('script'); sc.setAttribute("type","text/javascript"); sc.setAttribute("src", "/libraries/leaflet/leaflet.fullscreen.min.js"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(sc); }, 750); clusteringLoaded = false; } if(document.getElementById("leaflet_div") !== null) { var el = document.getElementById("leaflet_div"); el.parentNode.removeChild(el); } var d = document.createElement('div'); d.setAttribute("id","leaflet_div"); document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(d); stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph); leafletResize = function(stage) { document.getElementById("leaflet_div").setAttribute("width", stage.width()); document.getElementById("leaflet_div").setAttribute("height", stage.height()); document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.width = stage.width()+"px"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.height = stage.height()+"px"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.position = "absolute"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.left = stage.topLeft().x+"px"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.top = (stage.topLeft().y + stage.height() + stage.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph).corralBar.height()+2)+"px"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.display = "block"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.backgroundColor = "black"; } leafletResize(stage); if(typeof plotlyResize !== "undefined") plotlyResize(stage); setTimeout(function() { map = L.map('leaflet_div', { fullscreenControl: { pseudoFullscreen: true } }).setView([0, 0], 1); satelliteLayer = L.tileLayer('https://server.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/World_Imagery/MapServer/tile/{z}/{y}/{x}', { attribution: 'Tiles © Esri — Source: Esri, i-cubed, USDA, USGS, AEX, GeoEye, Getmapping, Aerogrid, IGN, IGP, UPR-EGP, and the GIS User Community' }); streetLayer = L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', { attribution: '© OpenStreetMap contributors' }); streetLayer.addTo(map); markerGroup = L.layerGroup().addTo(map); }, 1000);

block-definition.s: add marker at longitude %'long' latitude %'lat' size %'size' color %'color'

inputs.input: #0000ffblue=#0000ff green=#008000 red=#ff0000 yellow=#ffff00 orange=#ffc300 brown=#a04000 black=#000 white=#fff

block.l: if(document.getElementById("leaflet_div") === null) { alert("Initialize the map first"); } var marker = L.circleMarker([long, lat]); marker.setRadius(size); marker.options.color=color; marker.addTo(markerGroup);
if(document.getElementById("leaflet_div") === null) { alert("Initialize the map first"); } markerGroup.clearLayers();

inputs.input: #0000ffblue=#0000ff green=#008000 red=#ff0000 yellow=#ffff00 orange=#ffc300 brown=#a04000 black=#000 white=#fff

custom-block.s: marker at position %s size %n color %txt popup text %s

block-definition.s: marker at position %'geo' size %'size' color %'color' popup text %'text'

inputs.input: #0000ffblue=#0000ff green=#008000 red=#ff0000 yellow=#ffff00 orange=#ffc300 brown=#a04000 black=#000 white=#fff

block.l:
if(document.getElementById("leaflet_div") === null) { alert("Initialize the map first"); } timeout = 0; if(typeof markergroup === "undefined") timeout = 2000; coords = geo.split(";"); var marker = L.circleMarker([coords[0], coords[1]]); marker.setRadius(size); marker.options.color=color; var toHtmlList = function(l) { if(typeof l == "undefined") return "null"; if(typeof l.contents == "undefined") return l; var ret = l.contents[0] + ": "; if(typeof l.contents[1] != "undefined" && typeof l.contents[1] == "object") { for (let c in l.contents[1]) ret += c + ","; } else { ret += l.contents[1]; } return ret; } var toHtmlTable = function(tbl) { if(typeof tbl == "undefined" || tbl == null) return "null"; if(typeof tbl.contents == "undefined") return "null"; if(typeof tbl.contents[0] == "undefined") return "null"; // check if 2-dim if(typeof tbl.contents[0].contents == "undefined") return toHtmlList(tbl); var ret = ""; for (let r of tbl.contents) { ret += ""; for (let c of r.contents) { if(typeof c == "null") continue; if(typeof c == "object") { c = toHtmlTable(c); } ret += ""; } ret += ""; } ret += "
" + c + "
"; return ret; } setTimeout(function() { if(text == "") marker.addTo(markerGroup); else { if(typeof text == "object") { var tbl = "
" + toHtmlTable(text) + "
"; marker.addTo(markerGroup).bindPopup(tbl); } else { marker.addTo(markerGroup).bindPopup(text); } } }, timeout)

if(!clusteringLoaded) { var css2 = document.createElement('link'); css2.setAttribute("rel","stylesheet"); css2.setAttribute("href", "/libraries/leaflet/MarkerCluster.css"); var css3 = document.createElement('link'); css3.setAttribute("rel","stylesheet"); css3.setAttribute("href", "/libraries/leaflet/MarkerCluster.default.css"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css3); var sc2 = document.createElement('script'); sc2.setAttribute("type","text/javascript"); sc2.setAttribute("src", "/libraries/leaflet/leaflet.markercluster.js"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(sc2); } var time = 0; if(!clusteringLoaded) { clusteringLoaded = true; time = 800; } setTimeout(function() { var markerClusterGroup = L.markerClusterGroup(); markerClusterGroup.addLayers(markerGroup.getLayers()); map.removeLayer(markerGroup); markerGroup = markerClusterGroup; map.addLayer(markerGroup); }, 800);
var markerNormalGroup = L.layerGroup(); for (let l of markerGroup.getLayers()) markerNormalGroup.addLayer(l); map.removeLayer(markerGroup); markerGroup = markerNormalGroup; map.addLayer(markerGroup);

return listify(JSON.parse(jsonString)); function listify(jsonObject) { if (jsonObject instanceof Array) { return new List(jsonObject.map(function(eachElement) { return listify(eachElement)})); } else if (jsonObject instanceof Object) { return new List(Object.keys(jsonObject).map(function(eachKey) { return new List([eachKey,listify(jsonObject[eachKey])])} )) } else { return jsonObject } }

block-definition.s: bar chart: values: %'vals' labels: %'labels' name: %'name' colors (hex): %'colors'

block.l: values = "" + values; var valuesArray = values.split("✝"); if(valuesArray === null || valuesArray == "" || valuesArray.length == 0) { alert("No data defined for plot"); return; } var trace={y:valuesArray,type:type,name:name}; labels = "" + labels; var labelsArray = labels.split("✝"); if(labelsArray !== null && labelsArray != "" && labelsArray.length > 0) trace.x = labelsArray; colors = "" + colors; var colorsArray = colors.split("✝"); if(colorsArray.length > 0) { trace.marker = {color: []}; for (let col of colorsArray) { trace.marker.color.push("rgb("+col+")"); } } myplot.data.push(trace);
s = { type: 'line', xref: 'paper', y0: y, y1: y, x0: 0, x1: 1, line: { } }; if(rgb != null && rgb.length > 1 && rgb != "r,g,b") { s.line.color = "rgb("+rgb+")"; } myplot.layout.shapes.push(s);

if(document.getElementById("plotly_div") === null) { var sc = document.createElement('script'); sc.setAttribute("type","text/javascript"); sc.setAttribute("src", "/libraries/plotly/plotly.min.js"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(sc); } if(document.getElementById("plotly_div") !== null) { var el = document.getElementById("plotly_div"); el.parentNode.removeChild(el); } var d = document.createElement('div'); d.setAttribute("id","plotly_div"); document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(d); stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph); plotlyResize = function(stage) { if(!document.getElementById("plotly_div")) return; var offset = stage.height()+2+stage.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph).corralBar.height(); if(document.getElementById("leaflet_div") != null && document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.display != "none") offset += parseInt(document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.height)+5; document.getElementById("plotly_div").setAttribute("width", stage.width()); document.getElementById("plotly_div").setAttribute("height", stage.height()); document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.width = stage.width()+"px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.height = stage.height()+"px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.position = "absolute"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.left = stage.topLeft().x+"px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.top = (stage.topLeft().y+offset)+"px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.display = "block"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.backgroundColor = "black"; if(typeof Plotly !== "undefined") { redrawPlot(); }; } plotlyResize(stage); d = document.createElement('div'); d.setAttribute("id","plotly_fsbutton_div"); d.setAttribute("class","leaflet-control-fullscreen") document.getElementById("plotly_div").appendChild(d); d.style.display = "block"; d.style.top = "5px"; d.style.left = "5px"; d.style.position = "absolute"; a = document.createElement('a'); d.appendChild(a); a.style.width = "25px"; a.style.height = "25px"; a.style.display = "block"; a.style.backgroundColor = "#eee"; a.href = "#"; var plotlyFullscreen = false; a.onclick = function() { if(!plotlyFullscreen) { document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.width = "" + window.innerWidth + "px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").width = window.innerWidth; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.height = "" + window.innerHeight + "px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").height = window.innerHeight; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.left = "0px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.top = "0px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.zIndex = "9999"; document.getElementById("plotly_fsbutton_div").children[0].style.backgroundPosition = "0px -26px"; redrawPlot(); plotlyFullscreen = true; } else { plotlyResize(stage); document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.zIndex = ""; plotlyFullscreen = false; document.getElementById("plotly_fsbutton_div").children[0].style.backgroundPosition = ""; } } myplot = {}; myplot.data = []; myplot.layout = { margin: { l: 30, r: 30, t: 20, b: 30 }, }; myplot.layout.shapes = []; redrawPlot = function() { Plotly.newPlot('plotly_div',myplot.data,myplot.layout, {modeBarButtonsToRemove: ['sendDataToCloud','zoom2d','autoScale2d','toggleSpikelines']}); }
timeout = 0; if(typeof Plotly === "undefined") timeout = 2000; setTimeout(function() { redrawPlot(); }, timeout);
if(list == 0) return false; else return true;

block-definition.s: chart line y values: %'vals' name: %'name' color: %'rgb'

block.l: values = "" + values; var valuesArray = values.split("✝"); var trace={y:valuesArray,type:type,name:name}; if(rgb != null && rgb.length > 1 && rgb != "r,g,b") { trace.color = "rgb("+rgb+")"; trace.marker = {}; trace.marker.color = trace.color; } myplot.data.push(trace);

values = "" + values; var valuesArray = values.split("✝"); names = "" + names; var namesArray = names.split("✝"); var data = { values:valuesArray, type:type, labels:namesArray, }; myplot.data.push(data);

var createVar = function(varName,myself) { if(!myself.isVariableNameInUse(varName)) { myself.addVariable(varName, true); myself.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph).refreshPalette(); } }; createVar("server",this); createVar("user",this); createVar("password",this);
